main event: A civilian observed a light above a microwave antenna in Bridgeport, Ohio on November 17, 1966.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1-2 minutes,The observer reported the object moved towards the west,The object was described as a 30 ft long red light with an orangish color,The report indicates there was no physical evidence found,No photographs were included in the report.
sighted object: a light above a microwave antenna
